title: EluguHcman
author: EluguHcman
content: My dear people, abeg I say my bring this up for discussion but not to deliberate.How the poor go die and e go look common to the society and them go celebrate am but the rich go die and e go go viral with massive mourning leaving everyone in shock?Until we see ourselves Worthy to live, hatreds, segregations and unlawful acts of inhumans na n go be our definition otherwise, love, equality and humanity suppose be our definition here we lives.How a poor man go die news no carry am, media no Carry am, internet no Carry am and wetin u go dey hear na yes, make him die and lot of people feel celebrating over his exit but rich man go die all networking platforms and sites including village town cryers go put hand spread the news as a sad one leaving everyone mourning moods?Na so you go dey hear chai! Na waoh! Hmm! Jesus! And all that like say who hold the world breath don carry our oxygen go!This matter com dey make me feel like the poors just be like bonus to this world while the rich dey ordained to dominate and inherit this world.All status of lives supposed matter.

comments.author: RahimNda
comments.body: Good day everyone. I'd want to briefly discuss the concerns surrounding the rich and the poor.Due to their lack of wealth, the poor are treated like slaves, while the wealthy are regarded like kings. When a poor person passes away, it's common for people to merely offer prayers for the deceased. However, when a wealthy person passes away, everyone takes to social media to spread word of the death.

comments.author: Best-mary
comments.body: I understand your pain. But the koko be say life no balance.
